nodes.text: Into Exile is a two-minute LEGO Mini Movie that is connected to LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles animated TV series. It is the fifth video and was released on YouTube on May 21, 2014.

As the Old Republic falls, Jedi Master Yoda heads into exile and confusion. Yoda travels on his escape pod to the planet Dagobah but instead lands in the middle of an Imperial fleet. He is spotted by the bridge crew of an Imperial Star Destroyer, who demand his clearance code. Yoda fails to fool them and instead ploughs his escape pod through the Star Destroyer's bridge, sweeping two stormtroopers into space.

Yoda drives through the bridge of the Star Destroyer again and leads several TIE fighters on a pursuit. He runs circles through the fleet of Star Destroyers and manages to cause the TIEs to collide with the bridge of another Star Destroyer. After surviving his close call, Yoda arrives on Dagobah to begin a new life in exile.
